pullRequest.title: [FR] Codesnippest for all client's APIs
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added Codesnippets for all clients
fixes: #9256

commit.message: Form Training async client test part 1
Remove generic fieldvalue instead use generic FormField
add codesnippet for fr recognization endpoints

nodes.bodyText: Could probably write as, // if training polling operation completed, retrieve the final result ?
lets call this trainingPollOperationResponse indicating that it will return a poller instance.

extractedForm --> recognizedForm
update this for all customForms endpoint.

don't need this.
update this for all customForms eendpoint.

lets add confidence here too.
update this for all customForms endpoint.

boolean includeTextDetails = true;
and send that value in the call below.
No need to check for header in code snippets just print out the text if present for content endpoints.
Don't need to print this in a table. A simple for loop on all cell text printing text and bounding box should be enough.
remove?
whenever passing includeTextDetails as true show in the code where they can access form content.

Can we reuse these code snippets for the Readme too rather than a duplicate ReadmeSamples.java?
Just a thought.

same as async comments.
Don't need this, add confidence. use recognizedForm variable name.
In general, follow the same comments from Async and should be good for sync.
"Model Type Id: --> Form type:
"Max number of models that can be trained for this account"
Current count of trained custom models:

No need to subscribe on void.
just update this to formTrainingAsyncClient.deleteModel("{modelId}")
subscribe and print the response status

ID --> Id
use : instead of =, just to be consistent with other snippets.
Similar updates as Async client
extra * at the end of the line.

nodes.bodyText: trainingPollOperationResponse -> recognizePollingOperation.
everywhere applicable.
remove || from all content print statements.
applicable to all receipt recognize examples

"Form Type Id" -> Form Type
It is not an Id
Need to print merchant address and tax and phone number just to show various us receipt items.
we need only the values , not so much name.
print status code may be to show difference between with and without response?
like delteModelWithResponse

looks like this change should not be here?
